attributes.action: Remove Andrea Jenkins MP as eduction minister.
attributes.additional_details:
Sticking her middle finger up to members of the public means she must now be removed from her position for gross misconduct in public office as a member of parament.

She can now also no longer be seen as education minister as a roll model to support our children.
attributes.background:
Andrea Jenkins, MP when entering downing street whilst being  taunted by Boris supporters found it neccessary to stick her middle finger up at crowds. This has now been covered by all mainstrem media.

Link:
https://www.lbc.co.uk/news/andrea-jenkyns-made-education-minister/

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments. This includes calling for a Minister to be removed from their job.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
